entry.content:
Check out this introduction to my current book project and compendium digital archive, Archiving the "Obscene": Erotica, Pornography, and Censorship in Latin America, 1700-1955.  (This is a test, how to work this)

 

See Archivo El Insulto below.  This is a grassroots queer archive that focuses on the preservation, display, and circulation of erotic materials that have circulated in Mexico over the course of the twentieth century: https://www.elinsulto.com

 

The video below is an online conversation, in Spanish, between me and Michelle Davó and Adolfo Vega of Archivo El Insulto, through Moléculas Malucas: 

 

Below, please find a Facebook Live video conversation between me, Adolfo Vega, and Michelle Davó (of Archivo El Insulto), through the modern art museum, Museo Leonora Carrington in San Luis Potosí.  This was an event titled "Historia sobre la sexualidad en México en el Siglo XX."
